system.description:
This spell creates a glowing arrow that inflicts [[/r 1d6+1 #Magic missile damage]] (2-7) points of damage to any visible target specified by the caster. The arrow always hits and no saving throw is allowed. After the spell is cast, the arrow appears next to the caster and hovers there (moving with the caster) until shot.

For every 5 levels of experience, two additional missiles are created by the same spell. The caster can direct these missiles at one or multiple targets.
